# Cumulocity Web SDK Codex

This is the Codex for the Cumulocity Web SDK, which provides documentation and API references for the components and services available in the Cumulocity Web SDK.
These are mainly offered by the @c8y/ngx-components package, which is the main package for building Cumulocity applications using Angular.


## Advanced development
Complete toolkit for advanced Cumulocity platform development including services, hooks, extensions, and sophisticated integration patterns.

- [Advanced development](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development.md): Complete toolkit for advanced Cumulocity platform development including services, hooks, extensions, and sophisticated integration patterns.
### Directives
Custom HTML attribute directives for enhanced functionality

- [Directives](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/directives.md): Custom HTML attribute directives for enhanced functionality
- [If allowed directive](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/directives/if-allowed-directive.md)
- [For of directive](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/directives/for-of-directive.md)
- [Icon directive](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/directives/icon-directive.md)
- [Outlet directive](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/directives/outlet-directive.md)
- [Text autoresize directive](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/directives/text-autoresize-directive.md)
- [Translate directive](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/directives/translate-directive.md)

### Extension points & hooks
Extension points for dynamically extending applications using hooks, content projection, and services

- [Extension points & hooks](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks.md): Extension points for dynamically extending applications using hooks, content projection, and services
- [Action hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/action-hook.md)
- [Action bar hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/action-bar-hook.md)
- [Breadcrumbs hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/breadcrumbs-hook.md)
- [Computed property hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/computed-property-hook.md)
- [Docs hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/docs-hook.md)
- [Component hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/component-hook.md)
- [Navigator route hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/navigator-route-hooks.md)
- [Guide](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/hooks-guide.md)
- [Drawer hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/drawer-hook.md)
- [Preview features hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/preview-features-hook.md)
- [Pattern messages](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/pattern-messages-hook.md)
- [Query param bottom drawer](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/query-param-bottom-drawer.md)
- [Query param modal](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/query-param-modal.md)
- [Service hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/service-hook.md)
- [Tabs hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/tabs-hook.md)
- [Stepper hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/stepper-hook.md)
- [User menu hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/user-menu-hook.md)
- [Versions hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/versions-hook.md)
- [Widget config hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/widget-config-hook.md)
- [Widget hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/widget-hook.md)
- [Wizard hook](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/hooks/wizard-hook.md)

### Pipes
Data transformation utilities for templates

- [Pipes](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes.md): Data transformation utilities for templates
- [Bytes pipe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes/bytes-pipe.md)
- [Date pipe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes/date-pipe.md)
- [File icon pipe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes/file-icon-pipe.md)
- [Humanize pipe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes/humanize-pipe.md)
- [Number pipe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes/number-pipe.md)
- [Markdown to HTML pipe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes/markdown-to-html-pipe.md)
- [Translate pipe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes/translate-pipe.md)
- [User name initials pipe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/pipes/user-name-initials-pipe.md)

### Product experience
Gainsight PX integration for user analytics and engagement tracking

### Services
Application services and APIs for advanced development

- [Services](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services.md): Application services and APIs for advanced development
- [Alert service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/alert-service.md)
- [Api service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/api-service.md)
- [App state service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/app-state-service.md)
- [Data Explorer service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/data-explorer-service.md)
- [Options service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/options-service.md)
- [Realtime service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/realtime-service.md)
- [Permissions service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/permissions-service.md)
- [User preferences service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/user-preferences-service.md)
- [Widget config service](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/services/widget-config-service.md)

- [Feature modules](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/feature-modules.md)
- [Microfrontends](https://cumulocity.com/codex/advanced-development/microfrontends.md)

## Common tasks
Essential development tasks like creating custom widgets, tabs, and styling components

- [Common tasks](https://cumulocity.com/codex/common-tasks.md): Essential development tasks like creating custom widgets, tabs, and styling components
- [Custom tabs](https://cumulocity.com/codex/common-tasks/custom-tabs.md)
- [Custom widgets](https://cumulocity.com/codex/common-tasks/custom-widgets.md)
- [Application styles](https://cumulocity.com/codex/common-tasks/application-styles.md)
- [Overview](https://cumulocity.com/codex/common-tasks/overview.md)
- [Component styles](https://cumulocity.com/codex/common-tasks/component-styles.md)

## Components
UI component library for building user interfaces with consistent styling and functionality

- [Components](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components.md): UI component library for building user interfaces with consistent styling and functionality
### Application and system

- [Application and system](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/application-and-system.md)
- [iframe](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/application-and-system/iframe.md): Embedded frame component for displaying external content within Cumulocity applications with same-origin and cross-origin support
- [Internationalization](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/application-and-system/internationalization.md): System component for managing multi-language support and translations in Cumulocity applications with dynamic locale switching
- [Login](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/application-and-system/login.md): Authentication interface for Cumulocity platform login with session management and security features
- [Setup](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/application-and-system/setup.md): Initial configuration and setup wizard for Cumulocity applications and features with step-by-step guidance
- [Provider configuration](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/application-and-system/provider-configuration.md): Configuration interface for managing Cumulocity service providers and external system connections
- [Title](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/application-and-system/title.md): Page title component with Cumulocity branding that displays header titles and updates browser tab title

### Data display and visualization

- [Data display and visualization](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization.md)
- [Application icon](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/app-icon.md): Icon component representing Cumulocity applications with consistent styling and branding
- [Application card](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/application-card.md): Card display for Cumulocity application information with links, metadata, and launch actions
- [Custom dashboard](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/custom-dashboard.md): Configurable dashboard for displaying Cumulocity widgets and data visualizations with customization
- [Context dashboard](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/context-dashboard.md): Dashboard component that adapts to current Cumulocity context like selected device or asset
- [Data grid](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/data-grid.md): Advanced table component for displaying Cumulocity data with filtering, sorting, and pagination
- [Device connection status](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/device-connection-status.md): Visual indicator displaying current operational status of Cumulocity devices with color coding
- [List display switch](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/list-display-switch.md): Toggle between different visualization modes for Cumulocity data lists such as grid and table views
- [List group](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/list-group.md): Flexible list component for displaying series of related items with consistent styling and actions
- [Icon panel](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/icon-panel.md): Visual container displaying an icon with accompanying text or content for information display
- [Dropdown](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/dropdown.md): Menu component displaying list of options or actions triggered by a button or link
- [Popover](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/popover.md): Small overlay providing additional information or options when hovering or clicking an element
- [Map](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/map.md): Geographic visualization component for displaying Cumulocity device locations and spatial data
- [Range display](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/range-display.md): Visual representation of numeric ranges or value distribution with customizable styling
- [Properties list](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/properties-list.md): Structured display of Cumulocity object properties in key-value format with hierarchical support
- [Tooltip](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/tooltip.md): Small popup displaying helpful text when hovering over elements for additional context
- [Table](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-display-and-visualization/table.md): Data table component optimized for displaying Cumulocity platform data with built-in features

### Data input

- [Data input](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input.md)
- [Alarm event selector](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/alarm-event-selector.md): Specialized selector for choosing alarms and events from Cumulocity devices with filtering and search capabilities
- [AI chat](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/ai-chat.md): AI-powered chat interface for interacting with Cumulocity platform features and querying device data
- [Asset properties](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/asset-properties.md): Component for viewing and managing properties of Cumulocity assets and devices with editing capabilities
- [Button group](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/button-group.md): Groups multiple related buttons together in a single component with consistent spacing and layout options
- [Asset selector](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/asset-selector.md): Selection interface for choosing assets from Cumulocity asset hierarchy with tree navigation and search
- [Button](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/button.md): Interactive element for triggering actions with various styles, sizes, and states for forms, navigation, and in-page functionality
- [Data point selector](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/data-point-selector.md): Specialized interface for selecting measurement data points from Cumulocity devices with filtering and context support
- [Quick link](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/quick-link.md): Shortcut component for rapid access to frequently used Cumulocity features and pages with icon and label display
- [Data points export selector](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/data-points-export-selector.md): Tool for selecting and exporting Cumulocity data points to CSV or Excel formats for reporting and analysis
- [Realtime button](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/data-input/realtime-button.md): Control for toggling real-time data updates from Cumulocity platform with subscription management

### Forms

- [Forms](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms.md)
- [Checkboxes and radio buttons](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/checkboxes-and-radio-buttons.md): Form controls for single or multiple selections with checkboxes and radio buttons with customizable styling
- [Drop area](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/drop-area.md): Drag-and-drop zone for file uploads or content arrangement with visual feedback
- [Date and time](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/date-time.md): Input component for selecting dates and times with calendar picker interface and timezone support
- [Editor](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/editor.md): Rich text editor for formatted content creation and editing with toolbar controls
- [Extendable input list](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/extendable-input-list.md): Dynamic list allowing users to add, remove, and modify multiple input entries
- [File picker](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/file-picker.md): Upload interface for selecting and managing files from user's system with drag-and-drop support
- [Form group](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/form-group.md): Container component for organizing form fields with labels, validation messages, and help text
- [Dynamic forms](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/dynamic-forms.md): Programmatically generated forms based on JSON schema or configuration for flexible form creation
- [Form](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/form.md): Container and validation system for organizing multiple form inputs and controls with error handling
- [Input fields](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/input-fields.md): Text input components for collecting various types of user data with validation and states
- [Input groups](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/input-group.md): Combines input fields with buttons, icons, or text for enhanced form functionality
- [Range input](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/range-input.md): Slider control for selecting numeric values within a defined range with visual feedback
- [Select](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/select.md): Dropdown menu for selecting one or multiple options from a searchable list with filtering
- [Textarea](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/textarea.md): Multi-line text input for collecting longer form text content with resize options
- [Toggle switch](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/forms/toggle-switch.md): Binary control for enabling or disabling features or settings with visual toggle state

### Navigation and layout

- [Navigation and layout](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout.md)
- [Action Bar](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/action-bar.md): Fixed bar containing primary actions and controls for current page or view
- [Breadcrumb](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/breadcrumb.md): Navigation trail showing user's current location in application hierarchy
- [Bottom drawer](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/bottom-drawer.md): Sliding panel from bottom of screen for additional content without leaving current view
- [Card group](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/card-group.md): Organizes multiple cards in a responsive grid layout with consistent spacing
- [Card Layouts](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/card-layouts.md): Pre-configured card arrangements for common layout patterns and use cases
- [Collapse](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/collapse.md): Expandable and collapsible content section to save space and organize information
- [Card](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/card.md): Container component for grouping related content with optional header, body, and footer sections
- [Pagination](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/pagination.md): Navigation controls for browsing through multiple pages of content or data with page numbers
- [Navigation System](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/navigation-system.md): Main navigation structure for Cumulocity application menu, routing, and user interface layout
- [Resizable grid](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/resizable-grid.md): Flexible grid layout with user-adjustable column and row sizes for custom arrangements
- [Scrollbar](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/scrollbar.md): Custom scrollbar component with consistent cross-browser appearance and styling
- [Stepper](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/stepper.md): Multi-step process indicator guiding users through sequential workflow with progress tracking
- [Tab](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/tab.md): Navigation component for switching between different views or content sections within same page
- [Split view](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/navigation-and-layout/split-view.md): Resizable panel layout dividing screen into multiple adjustable sections with draggable divider

### Status, feedback, and notifications

- [Status, feedback, and notifications](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications.md)
- [Alert](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/alert.md): Displays important messages and notifications with contextual styling for success, warning, error, and info states
- [Badge](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/badge.md): Small visual indicator displaying status, counts, or labels with various color schemes and sizes
- [Countdown](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/countdown.md): Timer component displaying remaining time until a specific event or deadline with customizable format
- [Help](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/help.md): Information and guidance component providing contextual help and documentation to users
- [Empty state](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/empty-state.md): Placeholder display when no data or content is available, often with helpful guidance or actions
- [Loading](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/c8y-loading.md): Visual indicator showing content or process is loading or in progress with spinner or skeleton
- [Modal](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/modal.md): Overlay dialog box for displaying focused content or collecting user input without page navigation
- [Operation result](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/operation-result.md): Displays results and status of Cumulocity device operations and commands with success or error states
- [Pulse](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/pulse.md): Animated indicator showing active or live status of features or data with pulsing effect
- [Tag](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/status-feedback-and-notifications/tag.md): Label component for categorizing, filtering, or highlighting items with removable options

- [Overview](https://cumulocity.com/codex/components/overview.md)

## Design System
Comprehensive design guidelines, components, and tokens for consistent user experiences.

- [Design System](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system.md): Comprehensive design guidelines, components, and tokens for consistent user experiences.
### CSS utilities

- [CSS utilities](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities.md)

- [Flex containers](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities/flex-containers.md)
- [Flex items](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities/flex-items.md)
- [Margin and padding](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities/margin-padding.md)
- [Grid containers](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities/grid-containers.md)
- [Motion](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities/motion.md)
- [Position](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities/position.md)
- [Text](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities/text.md)
- [Using the grid](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/css-utilities/using-the-grid.md)

### Design tokens
This section covers the foundational design principles and elements that underpin the Cumulocity UI. These foundations ensure a consistent, cohesive, and intuitive user experience across all Cumulocity applications, whether they are built-in or custom-developed using the Web SDK.

- [Design tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens.md): This section covers the foundational design principles and elements that underpin the Cumulocity UI. These foundations ensure a consistent, cohesive, and intuitive user experience across all Cumulocity applications, whether they are built-in or custom-developed using the Web SDK.
#### Component tokens

- [Component tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/components.md)
- [Button tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/components/buttons-tokens.md)
- [Content component tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/components/content-tokens.md)
- [Form tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/components/forms-tokens.md)
- [Navigation tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/components/navigation-tokens.md)
- [Overlay tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/components/overlays-tokens.md)
- [Root component tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/components/root-tokens.md)

- [Branding tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/branding-tokens.md)
- [Application tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/application-tokens.md)
- [Color tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/color-tokens.md)
- [Components tokens](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/design-tokens/components-tokens.md)

### Foundations
This section covers the foundational design principles and elements that underpin the Cumulocity UI. These foundations ensure a consistent, cohesive, and intuitive user experience across all Cumulocity applications, whether they are built-in or custom-developed using the Web SDK.

- [Foundations](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/foundations.md): This section covers the foundational design principles and elements that underpin the Cumulocity UI. These foundations ensure a consistent, cohesive, and intuitive user experience across all Cumulocity applications, whether they are built-in or custom-developed using the Web SDK.
- [Elevation](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/foundations/elevation.md)
- [Grid and vertical rhythm](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/foundations/grid-and-vertical-rhythm.md)
- [Motion](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/foundations/motion.md)
- [Typography](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/foundations/typography.md)

### Patterns

- [Data actions](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/patterns/data-actions.md)
- [Data display](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/patterns/data-display.md)

- [Responsive design](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/patterns/responsive-design.md)

- [Accessibility](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/accessibility.md)
- [Icons](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/icons.md): Featuring Cumulocity's custom icons and Delite icon font.
- [Design system overview](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/overview.md)
- [Layout patterns](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/layout-patterns.md)
- [Styling guidelines](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/styling-guidelines.md)
- [Writing](https://cumulocity.com/codex/design-system/writing.md)

## Migration guides
Instructions and tips for migrating applications between different versions of the Web SDK.

- [Migration guides](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides.md): Instructions and tips for migrating applications between different versions of the Web SDK.
- [Migrating to ng-cli](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/migration-to-ng-cli.md)
- [Overview](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/overview.md)
- [Updating the Web SDK version](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/updating-web-sdk-version.md)
- [Upgrading to Web SDK 1018](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/updating-web-sdk-version/1018/overview)
- [Upgrading to Web SDK 1019](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/updating-web-sdk-version/1019/overview)
- [Upgrading to Web SDK 1020](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/updating-web-sdk-version/1020/overview)
- [Upgrading to Web SDK 1021](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/updating-web-sdk-version/1021/overview)
- [Upgrading to Web SDK 1022](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/updating-web-sdk-version/1022/overview)
- [Upgrading to Web SDK 1023](https://cumulocity.com/codex/migration-guides/updating-web-sdk-version/1023/overview)

## Quick start
Get up and running with Cumulocity Web SDK in minutes

- [Quick start](https://cumulocity.com/codex/quick-start.md): Get up and running with Cumulocity Web SDK in minutes
